message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product. It's tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the value it brings, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to ensure you have the chance to secure this exceptional product at a significant discount. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
